definition: Three Gorges Dam on the Yangtze River
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The flooding reignites one of the key debates over the construction of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 洪灾重新引发了就建设三峡大坝的主要争议之一。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is there, and is impossible to tear down.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝就在那里，并且不可能拆毁。

sentences.english: The dam further imperils delicate fish populations in the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝也进一步威胁着长江濒危鱼类的种群繁殖。

sentences.english: The Three Gorges Dam is the largest water conservancy project in Yangtze Vally.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝是长江流域最大的水利工程。

sentences.english: Another would bring water from the Three Gorges reservoir to the Danjiangkou reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面要把三峡大坝的水带入丹江口水库。

sentences.english: Both Gezhouba Project and Three-gorges dam are built in Yichang.
sentences.chinese: 葛洲坝工程和三峡大坝都处在宜昌。

sentences.english: One case is China's Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 中国的三峡大坝就是一个例子。

sentences.english: Water being released from the Three Gorges Dam in central China's Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 水流从中国中部湖北省三峡大坝被释放出来。

sentences.english: Once completed, the Three Gorges Dam will be the largest and most powerful hydro-electric project in the world.
sentences.chinese: 一旦完工，三峡大坝将成为世界上最大的水电站。

sentences.english: Engineers discovered cracks on the face of the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 工程师发现，三峡大坝表面有裂痕。

sentences.english: Just the Ming Dynasty Wall dwarfs10 the Three Gorges dam project, " Lindesay says."
sentences.chinese: 光是明代长城就使三峡大坝工程相形见绌。

sentences.english: Situated downstream from the dam, Dongting Lake is the second largest fresh water lake in China.
sentences.chinese: 洞庭湖位于三峡大坝下游，是中国第二大淡水湖。

sentences.english: For example, species can be propagated through the huge Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 比如，巨大的三峡大坝就有可能给物种入侵带来机会。

sentences.english: Tian-E-Zhou is 250 kilometers east of Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 天鹅洲保护区位于三峡大坝以东250公里的位置。

sentences.english: Besides the lack of rain, some experts blame the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 除了缺乏降雨外，有些专家还归因于三峡大坝。

sentences.english: Flood control was one of the primary reasons for building the Three Gorges Dam.
sentences.chinese: 三峡大坝的防洪效益一直是该工程的效益之首。

definition: Three Gorges on the Chang Jiang or Yangtze, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]/Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Three Gorges or Yangtze Gorges, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]
Three Gorges Reservoir on the Changjiang or Yangtze
Xiling Gorge on the Changjiang or Yangtze, the lower of the Three Gorges 三峽|三峡[San1 Xia2]
White Crane Ridge at Fuling, Sichuan on the Changjiang River, that used to show above the water at dry periods, with famous carvings
Huangguoshu waterfalls, Anshun 安順|安顺[An1 shun4], Guizhou
Lingqu canal in Xing'an county 興安|兴安, Guanxi, build in 214 BC to join Changjiang 長江|长江 with Pearl River 珠江
